string-array.name: prompts
string-array.item: How do I set boundaries and avoid absorbing someone else\'s emotions and stress? Boundaries are healthy and you should not hurt yourself to help someone emotionally
Do I forgive myself when I make a mistake? Remember, anyone can make a mistake because everyone is human :)
If I could do anything knowing I would not fail, what could I do?
If a genie granted me three wishes right now, what would I wish for?
What did I want to be when I grew up? In what ways did this vision change and in what way did this stay the same?
What goals do I hope to achieve in the short term?
What mistake did I learn the most from?
What scares me most about my future and why? What steps can I take to solve this?
What do you look forward to most in the future?
Imagine what your dream life would look like. What are some baby steps you can take to get closer to this life? Baby steps are still progress!
What new things would I like to learn? What do I believe is holding me back? Remember, growth is a process.
What is my goal today and how will I achieve it?
Have I ever accomplished a goal only to find out it wasn\’t fulfilling for me? What kind of goal was it?
When was the last time I accomplished a goal that made me feel good for a long time? What kind of goal was it?
When was the last time I felt most like myself?
What am I still trying to prove about myself and why?
What is my heart telling me? What is my mind telling me?
Which one do I follow more: my heart or my head?
What am I trying not to think about?
How do I put myself first without feeling guilty? Remember, do not hurt yourself to help someone
When was the last time I felt really disappointed or hurt? What helped me overcome it?
When was the last time I solved a tough problem and what did I learn from it? Yes you have because you are determined :)
Do I find praise or criticism to be more motivating?
What was it that I never told someone and still regret not telling them?
How can I cope when things are not going my way?
Do I engage in negative self-talk? What are some ways I can practice self-love? You are worthy of love :)
How do I go about making difficult decisions in life?
Do I believe that the present is better than the past and why?
What are some of the anger and frustrations that I have been carrying? What are some ways I can solve them? Yes, you have the ability to solve them :)
Which emotion best represents me, and why?
Write a letter to who I feel hurt me the most. (You don’t have to give it to them, just release some of the feelings)
What can\’t I live without? Does this have a positive or negative impact on my life? If negative, how can I work towards reducing or removing its presence in my life?
What was the topic, idea, or concept so engaging to me that I lost track of time? Why does it captivate me?
Do I speak up when I feel I\’m not getting what I deserve?
How old or young do I feel inside? Why?
What am I most afraid of about life?
Do I have any regrets that I can\’t let go of? Why? It\’s ok to have them :)
